attributes.action: Multiple Sclerosis degenerative Muscle wasting Disease a permanent disability
attributes.additional_details: Symptoms very similar to Fibromyalgia which has been deemed through courts as being a permanent disability so I say that Multiple Sclerosis should also be classed the same
attributes.background: Degenerative Muscle Wasting Disease taking away all independance

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

It's clear that you're concerned about the treatment of people with multiple sclerosis, but we're not sure what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
